sentences: Yrityksellä oli teknisiä ongelmia uuden järjestelmän kanssa.
context: Ongelmia is the partitive plural form of 'ongelma' (problem) in Finnish. It indicates problems/issues/difficulties that are being experienced or discussed. The partitive case often indicates an incomplete action, ongoing state, or undefined quantity, which fits well with experiencing problems - they may not be fully resolved yet.
